name: Unplanned Christmas
description:
Little logic game, which seems random, but is not. Explore the game and find out what is going on!

If you get stuck, click on repeat button (upper left corner) and think...

Story: You just woke up and found out, that today is Christmas! But you don't have any presents for your 100 friends :o! Luckily you found three guys with interesting deals. What better present can you give them than a cookie :)!

This game was made for Mini Jam 95: Chance, it was my fourth Game Jam. The theme was chance and limitation was No RNG. This game is more like prototype and shouldn't be taken as fully made project.

How this game works is described in "About" in menu.

Everything in the game (except Mini Jam logo) is created by me in limit of 3 days.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
